price: 9. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyow! Xusuusta Nicmadda Alle idiin galay markay idin yimaadeen ciidammo8, markaasaan ku dirnay dabeyl daran iyo ciidammo aydaan arag, Allena waxaad fashaan wuu Arkaa.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ جَآءَتۡكُمۡ جُنُودٞ فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا وَجُنُودٗا لَّمۡ تَرَوۡهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
footnotes: 8. Aayaddan waxay ka hadleysaa qisada axzaabtii, waana kooxo lagu jabiyey dagaalkii Godka, waayo waxay ka hor yimaadeen Alle iyo Rasuulkiisa. Waxaana loola jeedaa askar aydan arkin malaa’igta, wuxuu Allaah u soo diray inay halaagaan cadowyadiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū udh'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi ʿalaykum idh jāatkum junūdun fa-arsalnā ʿalayhim rīḥan wajunūdan lam tarawhā wakāna al-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīran
